20110117193336.000|20110117193337.000|CC1|LAST YEAR, HE HAD TO HOLD DOWN  
20110117193337.000|20110117193339.000|CC1|THE SET FROM THE HIGH WINDS AND 
20110117193339.000|20110117193340.000|CC1|KEEPING A NICE UMBRELLA OVER    
20110117193340.000|20110117193341.000|CC1|OUR HEADS, RIGHT?               
20110117193341.000|20110117193343.000|CC1|>> HE DID.                      
20110117193343.000|20110117193346.000|CC1|>> WHAT WE'RE SEEING NOW ON THE 
20110117193346.000|20110117193348.000|CC1|SCREEN IS CALIFORNIA.           
20110117193348.000|20110117193350.000|CC1|THE CONGRESS OF RACIAL EQUALITY 
20110117193350.000|20110117193350.000|CC1|OF CALIFORNIA.                  
20110117193350.000|20110117193353.000|CC1|AND THEY ARE PRESENTING THE     
20110117193353.000|20110117193354.000|CC1|PARADE TODAY.                   
20110117193354.000|20110117193356.000|CC1|IT'S ONE OF THE THREE CIVIL     
20110117193356.000|20110117193357.000|CC1|RIGHTS ORGANIZATIONS IN THE     
20110117193357.000|20110117193359.000|CC1|UNITED STATES WHICH BEGAN IN    
20110117193359.000|20110117193402.000|CC1|THE 1940s AND IS ALSO THE       
20110117193402.000|20110117193404.000|CC1|LONG-TIME FINANCIAL MANAGER OF  
20110117193404.000|20110117193405.000|CC1|THE KINGDOM DAY PARADE.         
20110117193405.000|20110117193407.000|CC1|THIS WOULD NOT BE GOING ON      
20110117193407.000|20110117193409.000|CC1|TODAY WITHOUT CORE.             
20110117193409.000|20110117193411.000|CC1|THE CHAIRMAN OF CORE IS ADRIAN. 
20110117193411.000|20110117193414.000|CC1|EFPS ONE OF THE FREEDOM RIDERS. 
20110117193414.000|20110117193416.000|CC1|FREEDOM RIDERS WERE CIVIL       
20110117193416.000|20110117193418.000|CC1|RIGHTS ACTIVISTS WHO IN 1961    
20110117193418.000|20110117193420.000|CC1|BOARDED INTERSTATE BUSES AND    
20110117193420.000|20110117193421.000|CC1|THEY DROVE INTO THE SEGREGATED  
20110117193421.000|20110117193422.000|CC1|SOUTH.                          
20110117193422.000|20110117193424.000|CC1|THIS WAS A TEST OF A RECENT     
20110117193424.000|20110117193426.000|CC1|SUPREME COURT DECISION THAT     
20110117193426.000|20110117193427.000|CC1|SAID SEGREGATION ON             
20110117193427.000|20110117193428.000|CC1|INTERSTATES, BUSES AND TRAINS   
20110117193428.000|20110117193429.000|CC1|WAS UNCONSTITUTIONAL SO THEY    
20110117193429.000|20110117193430.000|CC1|WENT INTO THE DEEP SOUTH AND    
20110117193430.000|20110117193433.000|CC1|THEY WERE MET BY A LOT OF       
20110117193433.000|20110117193433.000|CC1|OPPOSITION.                     
20110117193433.000|20110117193435.000|CC1|ANGRY MOBS OF PEOPLE, MANY
